en.name: KumuluzEE RestClient
en.shortDescription: Implementation of MicroProfile RestClient 1.0.1 for KumuluzEE platform.
en.description:
As part of project "Development of microservices for blockchain support and application in CRM system domains (MBCRM)" I implemented MicroProfile specification for RestClient for Kumuluzee platform.

MicroProfile

MicroProfile is an open-source JavaEE specification oriented towards microservice architecture

sl.name: KumuluzEE RestClient
sl.shortDescription: Implementacija MicroProfile RestClienta 1.0.1 za platformo KumuluzEE.
sl.description:
Kot del projekta "Razvoj mikrostoritev za podporo tehnologijam veriženja blokov (blockchain) in aplikacija na domeno CRM sistemov (akronim MBCRM)" sem implementiral MicroProfile specifikacijo RestClient-a za platformo KumuluzEE.

MicroProfile

MicroProfile je odprtokodna JavaEE specifikacija usmerjena v mikrostoritveno arhitekturo

en.name: Tasker
en.shortDescription: Application for performing tasks after CI cycle
en.description:
Application that can execute API call, shell command or plugin actions.

Currently used for deploying personal projects after CI cycle.

sl.name: Tasker
sl.shortDescription: Aplikacija za izvajanje opravil po CI ciklu
sl.description:
Aplikacija ki lahko izvaja API klice, ukaze v lupini in akcije vtičnikov.

Trenutno je v uporabi za namestitev osebnih projektov po CI ciklu.

en.name: Email service
en.description: Service for sending emails from other websites or applications.

sl.name: Email storitev
sl.description: Storitev za pošiljanje emailov iz drugih spletnih strani in aplikacij.

en.name: QDIS
en.description:
Information system that is built around the idea of having quick and easy delivery of new features.

QDIS is built with Angular and KumuluzEE JavaEE framework and is using MySQL and Keycloak for storage and authorization.

Application (apart from core functionalities) is built purely as client-side application. Developers need to only define data needed from server and set permissions who can access those datapoints. They can then be used all over application to develop various functionalities required for business.

sl.name: QDIS
sl.description:
Informacijski sistem, ki je zgrajen na ideji, ki omogoča hitro in lahko dostavo novih funkcij.

QDIS je zgrajen z Angular in KumuluzEE JavaEE spletnim ogrodjem in uporablja MySQL in Keycloak za hrambo in avtorizacijo.

Aplikacija (razen osrednjih funkcionalnosti) je zgrajena v celoti kot čelna aplikacija. Razvijalcem je potrebno samo definirati podatke, ki jih potrebujejo iz strežnika in nastaviti dovoljenja, kdo lahko do teh podatkov dostopa. Te podatkovne točke se nato lahko uporablja širom celotne aplikacije za razvoj raznih poslovnih funkcionalnosti.

en.name: LozigorBox
en.shortDescription: Lightweight fileshare for my personal use
en.description: Fileshare enabling me to store data and share it with other people.

sl.name: LozigorBox
sl.shortDescription: Preprosta shramba datotek za mojo osebno uporabo
sl.description: Shramba datotek, ki mi omogoča, da jih delim z drugimi.
